channel.title: Gpui on Home page of Debamitro Chakraborti

item.title: Attempting to Vibe Code in Rust
item.description:
It all started with a post on X I made, more than a month ago

is anybody doing vibe coding in rust?

— DebamitroChakraborti (@debamitro) March 27, 2025

Based on the responses, I knew I had to try it out. So I started looking for a project to do.

The project

A few months ago, I had vibe coded a tiny python project which classified Gmail messages by size. I decided to create a Rust version of it. I thought if I succeeded, it would be easier to distribute as a desktop application.
